projectPurpose: To provide a fast, lightweight, and simple-to-use cross-platform image viewer with broad format support, basic editing, and analysis capabilities, prioritizing performance and user privacy.
mainFeatures: Wide support for various image formats (common, RAW, professional/niche)
Basic non-destructive editing tools (crop, resize, color adjust, etc.)
Image analysis tools (pixel info, channel inspection)
Configurable image caching and hardware acceleration

marketPositioning: Oculante positions itself as a high-performance, privacy-aware, cross-platform image viewer that prioritizes speed and broad format compatibility over extensive management or editing features. It targets users needing a fast, reliable tool for viewing a diverse range of image types, including professional and niche formats, across different operating systems without the complexity or resource overhead of larger suites. Its minimalistic design, Rust-based performance, hardware acceleration, and privacy focus differentiate it from more feature-heavy or Windows-centric alternatives.
